snippet: A gunman opened fire in a shopping mall in suburban Portland, Ore., on Tuesday, killing at least two people and severely injuring another before killing himself.
abstract: Gunman opens fire in shopping mall in suburban Portland, Ore, killing at least two people and severely injuring another before killing himself.
lead_paragraph: A gunman opened fire in a shopping mall in suburban Portland, Ore., on Tuesday, killing at least two people and severely injuring another before killing himself.

headline.main: 3 Dead, Including Gunman, in Shooting at Oregon Mall
headline.print_headline: 3 Dead, Including Gunman, In Shooting at Oregon Mall
